textAfterTable: NOTE: Includes full-time, year-round workers ages 15 and above. “White” and “Black” exclude those who identified as Hispanic and/or reported more than one race category. “Hispanic” includes all those who so identified themselves, regardless of race. Source: U.S. Census Bureau, Current Population Survey, 2005 Annual Social and Economic Supplement. Information Please® Database, © 2007 Pearson Education, Inc.
